word_mean: 用视觉观察病人的神、色、形、态、舌象、排泄物、小儿指纹等的异常变化，以了解病情的诊断方法。

sentence.Network_en: After an inspection, the inspectors must publish a report.
sentence.Network_cn: 在视察之后，视察者必须发表一份报告。

sentence.Network_en: He discovered, on closer inspection, that the rocks contained gold.
sentence.Network_cn: 经过更为仔细的探察，他发现这些岩石含金。

sentence.Network_en: Whether the authorities will allow inspection is highly doubtful.
sentence.Network_cn: 当局是否允许检查还是个大问号。

entry.def: If you inspect something, you look at every part of it carefully in order to find out about it or check that it is all right.

example.ex: Elaine went outside to inspect the playing field...
example.tran: 伊莱恩走到外面查看操场。

example.ex: Cut the fruit in half and inspect the pips: if they are turning slightly brown it is ready for harvesting.
example.tran: 把果实切成两半，检查一下其中的籽：如果有点成棕色，那就该收获了。

entry.def: When an official inspects a place or a group of people, they visit it and check it carefully, for example in order to find out whether regulations are being obeyed.

example.ex: The Public Utilities Commission inspects us once a year...
example.tran: 公共事业委员会每年到我们这里视察一次。

example.ex: Each hotel is inspected and, if it fulfils certain criteria, is recommended.
example.tran: 会对每家旅馆都进行检查,如果它达到了一定的标准,就获得推荐。

sentences.sentence: "we had to wait for the inspection before we could use the elevator"

auth_sentence.content: On closer inspection that may not be the case.

stems_affixes.word_buile: circum周围+spect看→看周围→小心
per全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了的→透视的
prospect前景+ive……的→adj.预期的
respect尊敬+able可以……的→adj.可敬的;人格高尚的
respect尊敬,尊重+ful有……的→adj.恭敬的,尊重的
re回+spect看+ive……的→回头看[自己]→各自的
retrospect[v.回顾,回想]+ive……的→adj.追想的,回顾的
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
respective[adj.各自的,各个的]+ly表副词→adv.分别地, 各个地
pro前面+spect看→向前看→前景

stems_affixes.value_cn: 样子, 外表, 面貌, [问题等的]方面

circumspect[adj.小心谨慎的]+ion表名词→n.细心,慎重
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+or人→n.检查员, 巡视员
inspect[v.检查,调查,视察]+ion表名词→n.检查,审查;检阅

re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
spect看+acle东西→看的东西→景象;眼镜
spect看+acular……的→adj.壮观的,引人注目的 n.壮观的演出
spect看+ator人→看的人
spect看+rum→可以看的范围
re再+spect看→再看[一眼]→尊敬
ex出+pect=spect看→看出去,看外面→期待
in内,里面+spect看→看里面→检查
retro向后+spect看→向后看
spec=spect看+ulate→看准了→思考,投机
sus下面+spect看→在下面看一看,斜眼看→怀疑

sentences.en: a surprise inspection of the premises by the health inspector

sentences.en: A company’s accounting records must be open for inspection at all times.
sentences.cn: 公司的会计账目必须随时可以公开以备检查。
